summary: A Merchant that has a grand total of One Millionaire Gold also in every capital city.
descriptionHtml:
The Everywhere Millionaire!


A new merchant has landed in Skyrim and is looking to buy your goods. This merchant has a total of One Million Gold which you can sell your goods to. you can also use this merchant to storage your equipment and then by it back later (All Merchants Share Inventory)

The Reason?

The reason for this mod is that every merchant in Skyrim is always low on money when selling your items but now you can sell your items without money problems.

Where is the Merchant Located?

The Everywhere Millionaire is located in every capital and is most likely to be walking around near the blacksmith.


INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

1. Simply drop the .esp file into your Skyrim Data Folder  (C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\Steamapps\\Common\\Skyrim\\Data)

2. Enjoy your merchant!


NOTE: My first Official Mod for skyrim using the creation kit so it isn\'t the best

Problems: Short-Term Fix - after money stops coming in wait 48 hours then sell again
author: Joey Ireland
